title: #369 - Herb Dean
description:
Herb Dean, Professional MMA referee for promotions such as the UFC and Bellator, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:

ScoreBig - When you go to ScoreBig.com, click on the microphone and enter code: JOEY. to get $20 off of your first order.
 
Headspace: Go to headspace.com/joey and download the Free Headspace App and start your Take10 10 day free trial .
 
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a discount at checkout.
 
Recorded live on 04/06/2016.
